definition: to fill/to satisfy/to fulfill/to act in place of/substitute/sufficient/full
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Some sufficient and necessary conditions are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 爲此我們得到了一些充要條件。

sentences.english: In this paper, by using a model named symmetric cutting out, a necessary and sufficient condition for interval of search tending to zero is obtained.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了優選法中一維搜索區間趨於零的充要條件。

sentences.english: Finally, a sufficient and necessary condition of the diagonalizable block compound matrices is proved.
sentences.chinese: 最後讓明瞭塊複合矩陣可對角化的一個充要條件。

sentences.english: It is can deep - goinyly and precisely research, and decision has shift invariant sets of dynamic system.
sentences.chinese: 本文得到了緊緻系統有轉移不變集的另一個充要條件。

sentences.english: A necessary and sufficient condition of a class of non-homogeneous quadratic estimate admissible was given .
sentences.chinese: 並得到了一類非齊次二次型估計可容許的充要條件。

sentences.english: Laws are the necessary and sufficient condition for the realization and guarantee of this liberty.
sentences.chinese: 而法律則構成了實現和保證這種自由的充要條件。

sentences.english: The sufficient and necessary condition of possession justice is the both justice of acquirement and transfer.
sentences.chinese: 持有正義的充要條件是獲取與轉讓同時是正義的。

sentences.english: The quadratic curve is the necessary and sufficient condition of the noncentral curve as well as the equation's representative form.
sentences.chinese: 二次曲線爲非中心曲線的充要條件及方程表示形式。

sentences.english: It is proved that a function is Riemann integrable if and only if it is continuous almost everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 證明了函數可積的充要條件是該函數幾乎處處連續。
